TopicTitle: KSP2 EA now on sale for 20% off?!....

Articles.Content:
3 minutes ago, moeggz said:

You are allowed to your opinion...

Just now, Scarecrow71 said:

We are entitled to our opinion, just like you are entitled to yours.

I have my opinion, and I am expressing it.

Calling it an insult, offensive, or a slap in the face is overreacting.  It's a company doing business, nothing more or less.

And this time you were able to voice your opinion without condensation.

My response is that yes this is a business decision but one that shows the game is in trouble. And that I made a bad decision when I “invested” in early access by buying and not returning.

15 minutes ago, Buzz313th said:

Not a single effort being made by the Devs or the Publishing company has had a positive impact on the reputation of the product, as a matter of fact, each effort (Patches, press releases etc..) has had a negative effect.  This can only go on for so long.

A cursory glance at the patch notes tells me that there are in fact, many people happy with this patch. I think its just that people have a natural inclination towards how people react to things (both positive or negative). Personally, I always thought the price was too much, so to see people being able to get the price for a lower amount is nice. Sure if i waited I could’ve gotten the game for less, but thats the case for basically every game, I knew full well that I was spending 50 bucks and i was fine with that. 
 

For the context of this thread, the want for a sale isnt a new thing that came out of nowhere. I read this much more as something planned in advance instead of spur of the moment panic. See:

8 minutes ago, razark said:

My gods!  $10 off a game!

I have never been so insulted in my entire life!  This is the worst thing that could ever possibly have happened!  It's not right and fair and moral and nice and whatever else that other people are getting to have no fun playing this broken game for a lower price than I paid!  This is worse than that time I stubbed my toe!

I received the game as a birthday gift, so it's not even about the money for me. It's the image it portrays. The launch of the game has been an unmitigated disaster and this is just taking a big steaming dump on those that stuck with them from the start.

I tried patch 3 today. It sucks. I've uninstalled and requested a refund. I doubt I'll get it, but either way I'm finished with this joke.

Fair enough. Now that i see even mods liking sarcastic and condescending replies saying it’s unreasonable to be upset and being charged extra for the game I’m done. Will try to return the game tonight and if I can’t delete it and get off the internet. 
 

This team is no longer worthy of trust to deliver a finished product or respect their customers.
Overlapping threads have been merged

Most of the people here have the arguments down already. I just have to say I have never felt like I’ve been slapped in the face this hard before. Don’t get me wrong, I couldn’t refund because I went over the two hour limit, but I sure as hell tried. But now this…

Y’all at PD seriously don’t deserve to be working on this IP.
I feel stupid for ever having any positive opinion on KSP2 now.
